question: Which of the following bank bags Rajbhasha Kirti Puraskar award for the year 2016-2017?
explanation: Vijaya Bank was awarded the first prize under the Rajbhasha Kirti Puraskar (Region C) for the year 2016-2017 to honour of its work in implementing Hindi as a language in its day-to-day activities. President Mr.Ram Nath Kovind handed the award to the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Vijaya Bank, Mr.R.A.Sankara Narayanan.
